description: One paragraph explaining the functionality which is represented by this graph. What the main flow is and what is its purpose.

components.name: Agent Core
components.description: The primary orchestration component responsible for managing the lifecycle, execution flow, and decision-making process of AI agents. It drives the overall agent behavior and coordinates interactions with other components.

components.name: LangChain Integration
components.description: Provides the necessary abstraction and adaptation layer for seamless integration with LangChain, enabling the Agent Core to leverage large language models (LLMs) and execute various tools defined within the LangChain ecosystem.

components.name: Server Management
components.description: Manages the lifecycle, communication, and operational aspects of the underlying MCP server infrastructure. It handles server startup, shutdown, and facilitates the agent's interaction with the server environment.

components.name: Session Management
components.description: Responsible for creating, maintaining, and managing individual agent sessions. It ensures state continuity, context isolation, and proper resource allocation for ongoing agent interactions.

components.name: Telemetry & Monitoring
components.description: Collects, processes, and reports operational metrics, logs, and behavioral data related to agent activities. This component is vital for debugging, performance analysis, and understanding agent behavior.
